author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content: I do not wish to get involved in another country’s politics, but hope that after DT is voted out of office whoever becomes the next PotUS does a better job.

author: Doug Bostrom
content:
Guy acts like he was elected by a majority, a big one. Dumping WHO, exiting treaties, generally behaving as though he’d obtained broad, definitive permission to represent most of us. He didn’t. He’s tolerated like a fart in a crowded elevator. He should be walking on tiptoe.

Democratic or Republican, supermajority, just skating by, or party underdog: we’re _all_ constituents.
